content: i made this hat as an addition to a multidirectional scarf made from the same yarn i wanted something that went well with the garter stitch and enhanced the long colour runs of the yarn this pattern is available in english italian portuguese & german german instructions 1 italian instructions 2 portuguese instructions 3 thank you lisantanna 1 http //www maus-kreativ-handarbeiten net/vertigo-anleitung html 2 http //www maus-kreativ-handarbeiten net/vertigo-spiegazioni html 3 http //www maus-kreativ-handarbeiten net/vertigo-portugues html
